channel.title: [pi] custom yell tags [pi]
channel.description: i used to have custom tags on a server a while back right.. so i tried copying and pasting but obviously i got it wrong..i kinda jut wanna make my yell say [rape] :p and no one elses...im sure you know what i mean

item.title: [pi] custom yell tags [pi]
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

no you said [quote=“Ashton51, post:11, topic:386875”][quote author=infalibl3 link=topic=482644.msg3534707#msg3534707 date=1300484997]
i get an error saying:

src\server\model\players\packets\commands.java:204: ‘)’ expected

tand then it says:

}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“infalibl3”){
^
[/quote]
Then add a ) where the arrow is pointing…[/quote]
and the arrow is pointing to the l

item.title: [pi] custom yell tags [pi]
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
if (c.playerRights == 0){
}
if (c.playerRights == 1){

    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
   
    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[admin]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 3){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 4){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[player]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
  }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("infalibl3"){

c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[RAPE]<img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}[/code]
problem?

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] custom yell tags [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[code=Java]c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“infalibl3”)[/code

[code=Java] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
if (c.playerRights == 0){
}
if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“infalibl3”)){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Rape]<img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}
else if (c.playerRights == 1){

    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
    }else if (c.playerRights == 2){
   
    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Admin]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 3){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 4){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
  }
  }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] custom yell tags [pi]
item.dc:creator: @infalibl3 infalibl3
item.description:
@infalibl3 wrote:

heres my MASSIVE ::yell command thats UNORGINIZED but still there:

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
if (c.playerRights == 0){
}
if (c.playerRights == 1){

    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
   
    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Admin]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 3){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 4){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
  }
  }[/code]
